plot: Manuela and Roger are just "colleagues"/ "friends" as she says. But in between the lines she sends mixed messages which confuse Roger and lead to a series of awkward incidences.
title: Nur Kollege
plot_es: Manuela and Roger are just "colleagues"/ "friends" as she says. But in between the lines she sends mixed messages which confuse Roger and lead to a series of awkward incidences.
plot_en: Manuela and Roger are just "colleagues"/ "friends" as she says. But in between the lines she sends mixed messages which confuse Roger and lead to a series of awkward incidences.
